customerTier

${model.f_comment}

Attribute Help / Comment Format Attributes
uid  Help
The globally unique identifier.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
name  Help
The display name.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required
 
discountRate  Help
The default discount rate used for customers associated with this tier. This determines the discount amount off of list price. For example, suppose the list price is $100, and the discount rate is 0.25 (25%); then the discount will be $25 ($100 * .25) and the effective unit price will be $75.
  		double required
 
lockVersion  Help
This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.
  		lockVersion
